content.prompt: How does the work required to accelerate a particle from 10 m/s to 20 m/s compare to that required to accelerate it from 20 m/s to 30 m/s ?

choices.label: It cannot be determined without knowing the magnitude of the force exerted on the particle.
It cannot be determined without knowing the mass of the particle.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
